sources.title: The Creature of the Walking Dead (1965) PSYCHOTRONIC
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX
Stars: Ann Wells, George Todd, Bruno VeSota, Katherine Victor, Rock Madison (?)
Re-editor: Jerry Warren
Brought back to life by his grandson, a diabolical scientist with an unquenchable thirst for blood goes on a rampage.

TRIVIA: The Pauper of Trash Can Cinema Strikes Again! This 1965 release was re-edited by Jerry Warren from the 1961 Mexican horror film La Marca del Muerto, which translates as Mark of the Dead Man. The original film was directed by Fernando Cortés.

metadata.Plot: A mad scientist, who discovered the secret of eternal youth by draining of blood from a young woman, gets executed. His ancestor moves into the home, eventually discovering the scientist's body. He revives him, and the terror continues.
metadata.Writer: José María Fernández Unsáin, Jerry Warren
metadata.Actors: Rock Madison, Ann Wells, George Todd
